Subject: Re: Beachcomber and Redhot
References: <9h6mtn+lenf@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Firedrill looked stunned at the strange behavior, but remembered his
original offer. "You got it sir." he said. He knelt down on his hands
and knees, and then various parts of his body folded around,
transforming, until he was in police car mode. He then opened his trunk
up, as the seats inside folded down, to provide enough room for the
seeker to lie down.
